reviewText:
Loved the old movie with Burt Reynolds, and the new one with Adam Sandler.

It's nice that they put both together to buy...made a great gift.  The price was just right too!
this is great

I bought this double feature movie and it only came with one movie. The person who received this as a Christmas gift was very upset. I am highly dissatisfied.
Plays great no problems what so ever exactly as described thank u
Absolutely love the original, remake not so much... I was super happy with getting the movie and very quickly as well. This was just as described!
The great thing about this twosome is you will learn the remake does not stack up with the original!
First one is still the better of the two - but Sandler does a good job modernizing it.
Good movie set and good price.
movie arrived on time and works great!

I think putting the two versions of the longest yard together is an excellent idea. The quality of the movies are in excellent shape and was arrived on time. I would recommend this product to anyone who likes watching football, comedy, Adam Sandler, or Burt Reynolds.
Another good Adam Sandler movie. I have a great collection of his movies. I am a big fan. I also like having the original version.
